quotes.quote: He who speaks without modesty will find it difficult to make his words good.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The firm, the enduring, the simple, and the modest are near to virtue.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The superior man is modest in his speech, but exceeds in his actions.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Modesty is the citadel of beauty.
quotes.author: Demades

quotes.quote: I have often wished I had time to cultivate modesty... But I am too busy thinking about myself.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Humility is no substitute for a good personality.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Life is a long lesson in humility.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The loss of one's dignified bearing is often sudden.
quotes.author: Jerry Van Amerongen

quotes.quote: Be modest! It is the kind of pride least likely to offend.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: In America, they want you to accomplish these great feats, to pull off these David Copperfield-type stunts. You want me to be great, but you don't ever want me to say I'm great?
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: You couldn't be that good and not know it, somewhere in your secret heart, however much you'd been abused into affecting public humility.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Modesty is a shining light; it prepares the mind to receive knowledge, and the heart for truth.
quotes.author: Madam Guizot

quotes.quote: Always acknowledge a fault. This will throw those in authority off their guard and give you an opportunity to commit more.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I am no more humble than my talents require.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: If I only had a little humility, I'd be perfect.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: It well becomes a young man to be modest.
quotes.author: Titus Maccius Plautus

quotes.quote: In peace there's nothing so becomes a man as modest stillness and humility.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare
